item.description: Enjoyed a discussion with my friend @ShapiraDor on negotiation and the Abraham Accords. We are already witnessing the fruits of cooperation. The future looks promising and we look forward to achieving greater success together. Thank you @UNITAR ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ª ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡± pic.twitter.com/ArTxhd4qGn — Ù‡Ù†Ø¯ Ù…Ø§Ù†Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø¹ØªÙŠØ¨Ø© Hend Al Otaiba (@hend_mana) March 9, 2021
item.content:encoded:
Enjoyed a discussion with my friend @ShapiraDor on negotiation and the Abraham Accords. We are already witnessing the fruits of cooperation. The future looks promising and we look forward to achieving greater success together. Thank you @UNITAR
